text: wahum aladhin sabaruu ealaa al'adhaa waealaa altaet, waean almesyt tlbana lrda rbhm, waddu alsalat ealaa atmm wjwhha, waddu min 'amwalihim zkathm almfrwdt, walnfqat almsthbt fi alkhfa' waleln, wydfewn bialhasanat alsayiyat ftmhwha, 'uwlayik almwswfwn bhdhh alsfat lahum aleaqibat almhmwdt fi alakhrt
